definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
Liu Xiang (1983-), Chinese gold-medal hurdler of the 2004 Olympic Games
Andy Lau (1961-), Hong Kong Cantopop singer and actor
Liu Bei (161-223), warlord at the end of the Han dynasty and founder of the Han kingdom of Shu 蜀漢|蜀汉 (c. 200-263), later the Shu Han dynasty
Liu Shaoqi (1898-1969), Chinese communist leader, a martyr of the Cultural Revolution
Liu Yang (1978-), China's first female astronaut in space (June 16, 2012)
Liu Bang (256 or 247-195 BC), bandit leader who became first Han emperor Han Gaozu 漢高祖|汉高祖 (reigned 202-195 BC)
Liu Yunshan (1947-), PRC politician, background in journalism in Inner Mongolia, head of the Central Propaganda Department 2002-2012
Liu Yi (-285), famous incorruptible official of Western Jin dynasty the Western Jin dynasty 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316)/Liu Yi (-412), general of Eastern Jin dynasty 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420)
Liu Xiang (77-6 BC), Han Dynasty scholar and author
Liu Heng, personal name of Han emperor Han Wendi 漢文帝|汉文帝/Liu Heng (1954-), Chinese writer

sentences.english: Meng shu and liu to fisticuffs, as a result, liu pain beat.
sentences.chinese: 为此孟蜀和刘地大打出手，结果刘地被痛揍一顿。

sentences.english: My name is Liujunjie. She is Heyi. We are good friends.
sentences.chinese: 我是何怡，他是我的好朋友刘俊杰。

sentences.english: LiuJianGong etc people get shangguan form mining tunnel after the information.
sentences.chinese: 刘建功等人得到上官于飞挖掘地道的信息之后。

sentences.english: Doctor Liu is on call at all times.
sentences.chinese: 不论什么时候刘医生随叫随到。

sentences.english: They told that Professor Liu would have been teaching here for twenty years by this winter.
sentences.chinese: 他们说到今年冬天时刘教授在这里教书要满二十年了。

sentences.english: After the purchase of an insurance policy under the Absolute Assignment, Liew was found dead in his house.
sentences.chinese: 两人在互保后不久，刘被发现死在家中的浴缸里。

sentences.english: The whole audience rose as the Chancellor and the Ambassador walked onto the rostrum and took their seats.
sentences.chinese: 全体听众起立，彭定康校长和刘大使走上主席台落座。

sentences.english: Conclusion Clinical investigation was satisfactory recently at immediate restoration of single implant crown.
sentences.chinese: 结论单牙即刘修复近期临床观察效果满意。

sentences.english: Our general manager, Mr. Liu's idea is the best.
sentences.chinese: 我们刘总经理提出的设想最好。

sentences.english: She told about Aunt Liu, who was very kind to her.
sentences.chinese: 她谈了谈刘大婶的情况，她对她非常好。

sentences.english: Can you help me? I have to see Professor Liu and she is a gynecologist.
sentences.chinese: 我需要找妇科的刘医生看病，你能帮我吗？

sentences.english: Xingge Liu, Central South University, China.
Residents Liu used cell phone cameras to the video of the construction site at night.
sentences.chinese: 居民刘军用手机拍摄到了工地夜间施工的视频。

sentences.english: David Lau was given 30 seconds penalty due to the jump start.
sentences.chinese: 凯飞车队的刘英杰因偷跑而被罚时30秒。

sentences.english: Xu felt that she had tied Liu down and repeatedly asked him, 'Are you regretful?
sentences.chinese: 徐认为，她绑住刘下来，反复问他，你是否有后悔？

sentences.english: These are addressed to our training company commander Liu often shouted words.
sentences.chinese: 以上都是刘连长在给我们训练时常喊的话。

definition: surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
